attributes.description: Detect disabled security products on Windows (14+ vendors) via services status (stopped/paused) and Windows Defender registry tampering indicators. Related to MITRE T1562.001 (Impair Defenses: Disable or Modify Tools).
attributes.query:
-- Defense Evasion: Security Products Disabled Detection
-- Detects disabled security products via TWO mechanisms:
-- 1. Services check: Security product services with STOPPED/PAUSED status
-- 2. Registry check: Windows Defender disabled status in registry (12 values from WA Cyber T1562.001)

WITH defender_registry AS (
  SELECT
    r.key,
    r.path,
    r.name,
    r.data,
    r.type,
    datetime(r.mtime, 'unixepoch') AS modified_time,
    CASE
      -- Features (value 0 = disabled)
      WHEN r.name = 'TamperProtection' AND (r.data = '0' OR r.data = '4') THEN 'Tamper Protection Disabled'
      WHEN r.name = 'MpEnablePus' AND r.data = '0' THEN 'PUA Protection Disabled'
      -- Policies (value 1 = disabled)
      WHEN r.name = 'DisableAntiSpyware' AND r.data = '1' THEN 'Windows Defender Disabled via Policy'
      WHEN r.name = 'DisableAntiVirus' AND r.data = '1' THEN 'Antivirus Disabled via Policy'
      -- Real-Time Protection (value 1 = disabled)
      WHEN r.name = 'DisableRealtimeMonitoring' AND r.data = '1' THEN 'Real-time Monitoring Disabled'
      WHEN r.name = 'DisableBehaviorMonitoring' AND r.data = '1' THEN 'Behavior Monitoring Disabled'
      WHEN r.name = 'DisableOnAccessProtection' AND r.data = '1' THEN 'On-Access Protection Disabled'
      WHEN r.name = 'DisableScanOnRealtimeEnable' AND r.data = '1' THEN 'Scan on Real-time Enable Disabled'
      WHEN r.name = 'DisableIOAVProtection' AND r.data = '1' THEN 'IOAV Protection Disabled'
      WHEN r.name = 'DisableScriptScanning' AND r.data = '1' THEN 'Script Scanning Disabled'
      -- Spynet/MAPS (value 0 = disabled)
      WHEN r.name = 'SpynetReporting' AND r.data = '0' THEN 'Cloud Protection Reporting Disabled'
      WHEN r.name = 'SubmitSamplesConsent' AND r.data = '0' THEN 'Sample Submission Disabled'
      ELSE 'Unknown Defender Tampering'
    END AS tampering_description,
    'DEFENDER_REGISTRY_TAMPERING' AS detection_method
  FROM registry r
  WHERE (
    -- Windows Defender Features (value 0 or 4 = disabled)
    (r.key = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Features'
     AND r.name = 'TamperProtection'
     AND (r.data = '0' OR r.data = '4'))
    -- MpEngine (value 0 = disabled)
    OR (r.key = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows Defender\MpEngine'
        AND r.name = 'MpEnablePus'
        AND r.data = '0')
    -- Windows Defender Policies (value 1 = disabled)
    OR (r.key = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows Defender'
        AND r.name IN ('DisableAntiSpyware', 'DisableAntiVirus')
        AND r.data = '1')
    -- Real-time Protection (value 1 = disabled)
    OR (r.key = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Real-Time Protection'
        AND r.name IN ('DisableRealtimeMonitoring', 'DisableBehaviorMonitoring',
                       'DisableOnAccessProtection', 'DisableScanOnRealtimeEnable',
                       'DisableIOAVProtection', 'DisableScriptScanning')
        AND r.data = '1')
    -- Spynet/MAPS (value 0 = disabled)
    OR (r.key = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Spynet'
        AND r.name IN ('SpynetReporting', 'SubmitSamplesConsent')
        AND r.data = '0')
  )
),
security_services AS (
  SELECT
    s.name AS service_name,
    s.display_name,
    s.status,
    s.start_type,
    s.path AS service_path,
    s.user_account,
    datetime(r_key.mtime, 'unixepoch') AS service_modified_time,
    CASE
      WHEN s.name IN ('MsMpSvc', 'WinDefend', 'WdNisSvc', 'WdNisDrv', 'WdBoot', 'WdFilter', 'Sense') THEN 'Microsoft Defender'
      WHEN s.name LIKE 'CSFalcon%' OR s.name = 'CSAgent' THEN 'CrowdStrike'
      WHEN s.name LIKE 'Sep%' OR s.name LIKE 'Symantec%' OR s.name = 'ccSvcHst' THEN 'Symantec/Broadcom'
      WHEN s.name LIKE 'mfe%' OR s.name LIKE 'McAfee%' THEN 'McAfee'
      WHEN s.name LIKE 'ekrn%' OR s.name LIKE 'eset%' OR s.name = 'ekm' THEN 'ESET'
      WHEN s.name LIKE 'Sophos%' OR s.name = 'SAVService' THEN 'Sophos'
      WHEN s.name LIKE '%Trend%' OR s.name LIKE 'Tmx%' OR s.name = 'TmListen' THEN 'Trend Micro'
      WHEN s.name LIKE 'Carbon%' OR s.name = 'CbDefense' THEN 'Carbon Black'
      WHEN s.name LIKE 'Sentinel%' THEN 'SentinelOne'
      WHEN s.name LIKE 'Cylance%' THEN 'Cylance'
      WHEN s.name LIKE 'AVP%' OR s.name LIKE 'klnagent%' OR s.name LIKE 'Kaspersky%' THEN 'Kaspersky'
      WHEN s.name LIKE 'MBAMService%' OR s.name LIKE 'Malwarebytes%' THEN 'Malwarebytes'
      WHEN s.name LIKE 'Palo%' OR s.name = 'traps' OR s.name = 'cyserver' THEN 'Palo Alto Networks'
      WHEN s.name LIKE 'Bit%Defender%' OR s.name LIKE 'bdredline%' THEN 'Bitdefender'
      ELSE 'Other Security Product'
    END AS security_vendor,
    'SECURITY_SERVICE_STOPPED' AS detection_method
  FROM services s
  LEFT JOIN registry r_key
    ON r_key.key = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\System\CurrentControlSet\Services\' || s.name
    AND r_key.name = 'Start'
  WHERE s.status IN ('STOPPED', 'PAUSED', 'STOP_PENDING', 'PAUSE_PENDING')
    AND (
      -- Microsoft Defender services
      s.name IN ('MsMpSvc', 'WinDefend', 'WdNisSvc', 'WdNisDrv', 'WdBoot', 'WdFilter', 'Sense')
      -- CrowdStrike
      OR s.name LIKE 'CSFalcon%' OR s.name = 'CSAgent'
      -- Symantec/Broadcom
      OR s.name LIKE 'Sep%' OR s.name LIKE 'Symantec%' OR s.name = 'ccSvcHst'
      -- McAfee
      OR s.name LIKE 'mfe%' OR s.name LIKE 'McAfee%'
      -- ESET
      OR s.name LIKE 'ekrn%' OR s.name LIKE 'eset%' OR s.name = 'ekm'
      -- Sophos
      OR s.name LIKE 'Sophos%' OR s.name = 'SAVService'
      -- Trend Micro
      OR s.name LIKE '%Trend%' OR s.name LIKE 'Tmx%' OR s.name = 'TmListen'
      -- Carbon Black
      OR s.name LIKE 'Carbon%' OR s.name = 'CbDefense'
      -- SentinelOne
      OR s.name LIKE 'Sentinel%'
      -- Cylance
      OR s.name LIKE 'Cylance%'
      -- Kaspersky
      OR s.name LIKE 'AVP%' OR s.name LIKE 'klnagent%' OR s.name LIKE 'Kaspersky%'
      -- Malwarebytes
      OR s.name LIKE 'MBAMService%' OR s.name LIKE 'Malwarebytes%'
      -- Palo Alto Networks
      OR s.name LIKE 'Palo%' OR s.name = 'traps' OR s.name = 'cyserver'
      -- Bitdefender
      OR s.name LIKE 'Bit%Defender%' OR s.name LIKE 'bdredline%'
    )
)

-- Combine results from both detection methods
SELECT * FROM (
  SELECT
    ss.service_name,
    ss.display_name,
    ss.status,
    ss.start_type,
    ss.service_path,
    ss.user_account,
    ss.service_modified_time AS modified_time,
    ss.security_vendor,
    ss.detection_method,
    'Service Stopped/Paused' AS detection_reason,
    NULL AS registry_key,
    NULL AS registry_path,
    NULL AS registry_name,
    NULL AS registry_value
  FROM security_services ss

  UNION ALL

  SELECT
    NULL AS service_name,
    NULL AS display_name,
    NULL AS status,
    NULL AS start_type,
    NULL AS service_path,
    NULL AS user_account,
    dr.modified_time,
    'Windows Defender' AS security_vendor,
    dr.detection_method,
    dr.tampering_description AS detection_reason,
    dr.key AS registry_key,
    dr.path AS registry_path,
    dr.name AS registry_name,
    dr.data AS registry_value
  FROM defender_registry dr
) AS combined
ORDER BY
  CASE WHEN detection_method = 'DEFENDER_REGISTRY_TAMPERING' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
  security_vendor,
  service_name;
